description: {"blocks":[{"key":"91lq","text":"This protocol lists materials, setup, and steps to perform a fast and successful mouse perfusion for brain harvesting.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
ethics_statement: {"blocks":[{"key":"f2bs5","text":"the protocol needs prior approval by the users' Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC) or equivalent ethics committee. This work was approved by UCSD IACUC S19028","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"9167l","text":"Equipment","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cv4bi","text":"Peristaltic Pump (Watson-Marlow 205S)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4bl23","text":"Isoflurane vaporizer with induction chamber and nose-cone","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"al3e5","text":"4 Beakers","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"74bkj","text":"Styrofoam box and lid","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"36rcd","text":"Ice container","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bba7j","text":"Tools","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5r128","text":"2 Surgical Scissors, large and small","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"23s5s","text":"1 Hemostat","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7uuoq","text":"2 Forceps, blunt and sharp","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e78m","text":"1 Spatula ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"68u35","text":"Solutions","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cg0bl","text":"PFA (4%PFA/PBS BRAND, ~40 ml per animal) ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4kp9h","text":"PBS (1x, ~20 ml per animal)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3hll2","text":"1x PBS with NaN3 (0.02% NaN3, enough to fill vials)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":15,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"17na2","text":"Isofluorane (brand, cas #)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"61g2","text":"O2 tank","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":1,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3mbug","text":"Consumables","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":11}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f6si9","text":"Parafilm","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3k07d","text":"Aluminum foil","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6igmb","text":"26g needles","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ee4l6","text":"Needles for pinning (18g)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"82nj5","text":"Bench Pads","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ics","text":"Ice","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1n6pa","text":"Sample vials (for each brain) - brand","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"fkvrb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bu7qg","text":"Beakers and Solutions","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":21}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2edp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"72ua8","text":"Prepare the first beaker with cold PFA, on ice, cover with parafilm (leave small opening for the tube) ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fa9d4","text":"Prepare the second beaker with cold PBS, on ice, cover with parafilm (leave small opening for the tube)  ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4bnff","text":"Prepare a third beaker for waste collection (end of the line)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7qb1j","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1me36","text":"Peristaltic Pump (using one line)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":33}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1jbf8","text":"Set up the peristaltic pump to a rate of 12 mL per minute (50 RPM)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2ijq5","text":"Purge the line with PBS by setting it to CW (Clockwise) and press start ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":41,"length":2},{"style":"bold","offset":66,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3mg9h","text":"When the line is purged press stop ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":30,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bih5o","text":"Place a 26G needle on the end of the tubing","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6nf37","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1t1o","text":"Tubes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"mvbu","text":"Label, fill tubes with PFA and put on ice, ready for brain harvesting","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"emq34","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a85ct","text":"Work station ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8nnk7","text":"A convenient workstation is a styrofoam surface (wrapped in aluminum foil) for pinning the mouse, placed at an angle to direct the exit flow of into a waste container (e.g. make a hole/opening towards the bottom of the styrofoam surface to guide the waste into a collection beaker placed inside a container onto which the surface rests","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"21bha","text":"Place bench padding where brain dissecting will be performed under the dissection tools, for easy cleanup","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1pb72","text":"Set up anesthesia induction chamber with 1-3% isofluorane in oxygen using a vaporizer   ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3gl56","text":"Sedating Mouse","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4btre","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1q7vv","text":"Sedate mouse in a chamber ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"alsu","text":"Observe respiratory rate to evaluate the level of anesthesia","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cau0d","text":"Use toe-pinch and corneal reflex to ensure mouse is on a stable surgical plane","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2ed65","text":"Switch isoflurane flow from chamber to nosecone","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7js0k","text":"Move the mouse over to the perfusion station in nosecone ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8jocr","text":"Double-check toe-pinch","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e2aml","text":"Pin down the mouse","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"73n0u","text":"Brain Dissections","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8jjjv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f6b75","text":"Perform during step 8 of section 4","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":34}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f2d53","text":"Ensure excess PFA has run off mouse into collection beaker","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"93v36","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e7dj3","text":"Move the mouse to the lab pad for dissection","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fnerl","text":"Use large surgical scissors to decapitate the mouse ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"551o7","text":"Dispose of carcass in institute appropriate waste bag (Ensure proper disposal of PFA contaminated carcass) ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"edoll","text":"Use smaller surgical scissors, forceps, and spatula to cleanly dissect the brain","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"85iij","text":"Place brain in labeled vial with PFA solution on ice","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3rdpo","text":"Move vials with brains into the fridge with gentle shaking overnight","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e06fv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8cn4h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"endfm","text":"Perfusion","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"48j34","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8kso2","text":"Ensure that the tubing has been purged with PBS and that there is a 26G needle on the end ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":90}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9017u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4q7j2","text":"Start pump (running PBS, CW)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6},{"style":"bold","offset":25,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d0gqn","text":"Control the heart with forceps (blunt, left hand) and insert the bevel of the needle in the left ventricle ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dhrni","text":"Immediately make a small incision in the right atrium with the sharp forceps","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e89eb","text":"Perfuse with PBS for 1 min (Make sure to hold the needle steady, and not go too deep into the heart)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"539qq","text":"Stop the pump and switch the line from the PBS to the PFA beaker","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3jpun","text":"Start the pump perfuse with PFA for 3 min (In case of successful perfusion: the organs/paws will immediately start getting paler and the mouse will display muscle twitches)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5m8s5","text":"Press CCW (Counterclockwise) to remove all PFA from the line back into the beaker (and start dissection of section 4)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":6,"length":4},{"style":"italic","offset":82,"length":35}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5psql","text":"Stop the pump","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"br9js","text":"           -  If another dissection follows: place it in PBS press CW and Start to purge the line and press stop","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":67,"length":2},{"style":"bold","offset":74,"length":6},{"style":"bold","offset":107,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"15jqh","text":"           -  If the last dissection: Follow the same steps to purge the line with PBS and dry by passing air through the line","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2ttsf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"csigs","text":"Ensure proper disposal of liquid chemical waste","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":47}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2r7h0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9b4rs","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3qggg","text":"Wash and storage","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cc38l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5p7ng","text":"The next day, wash harvested brains 3x for 30 minutes in 1x PBS with Aza (0.02% NaN3)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":83,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2njmm","text":"The brains can be stored at 4°C","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6me1f","text":"Exposing Heart","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3o7ie","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"31n4r","text":"Grab the sternum with forceps (blunt, left hand) and make a v-cut incision below scissors (right hand), exposing the diaphragm  ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"df61d","text":"Make 2 upward cuts (left and right side of the body) through the diaphragm, ribcage, and skin","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f5nuk","text":"Clamp the sternum with a hemostat and open the chest to expose the heart","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Mouse Perfusion Protocol
warning: {"blocks":[{"key":"d2n42","text":"paraformaldehyde is toxic, work in a chemical hood ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
